charge_angle.description: If the target is outside of this angle, then we start to cancel the charge

passed_stop_time.description: Time to stop charging after passing target

stop_charge_ability.description: The ability to play when the charger should stop charging.

lock_rotation_distance.description: If the target closer than this distance, the charger will lock in.

lock_rotation_ability.description: The one-shot ability to play when the charger is close enough to lock the rotation.
